729682f-a.title: Richmond: Spencer Street - Chelsea Road
729682f-a.text:
Spencer Street, west from Chelses Road
toward Arthur Kill. The vessels tied up in the Kill
are old United States Shipping Board boats.
May 16, 1937
P. L. Sperr
729682f-a.folder: Spencer Street & Chelsea Road, Staten Island, NY

728680f-a.title: Richmond: Chelsea Road - Spencer Road
728680f-a.text:
(1)
Chelsea Road, north side, east of Spencer Street (point of
vantage), showing the W.F. Carey house and barn (1853-1874). It
was later the Wm. T. Meredith property (1898-1917). The house is
about 400 feet back of the road. In the far background is visible
Goethals Bridge.
May 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
May 16, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
728680f-a.folder: Chelsea Road & Spencer Road, Staten Island, NY
